returns.claimed: The actual amount transferred to the user
returns.newGenerationCRAmount: New generation crToken minted to the user

params._ratio: Payout ratio of this payout (users can only use part of their crTokens to claim)

claim(address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: Claim payout for a user         Only callable from policy center         Need provide certain crToken address and generation

newPayout(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: New payout comes in         Only callable from one of the priority pools         After the pool's report is passed and executed,         part of the assets will be moved to this pool.

userdoc.notice: Payout Pool         Every time there is a report passed, some assets will be moved to this pool         It is stored as a Payout struct         - amount       Total amount of this payout         - remaining    Remaining amount         - endTimestamp After this timestamp, no more claims         - ratio        Max ratio of a user's crToken
